JOB DESCRIPTION: Role: Software Developer      About the role     The successful candidate will be responsible for Care Director/RAISE Finance application. Along with the general development of the software, the successful candidate will also be involved with the debugging the issues and developing fixes for future releases. This role is heavily SQL based so a strong transaction SQL background is required in addition to traditional programming skills.     Essential Skills     o Strong, demonstrated SQL    o Exposure to Transact SQL    o Minimum of 2 years Software development experience    o Exposure to SSIS, SSRS    o C#, VB and .Net Frameworks    o Good understanding of SOLID and OO development principals    o MS Dynamics CRM an advantage
